programme.title: A Pedra Vermelha deixa Kars praticamente invencível. Joseph planeja atrair Kars para um vulcão e acabar com ele por lá.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kars surge da lava derretida e ataca Joseph, que instintivamente segura a Pedra Vermelha para se proteger dos golpes do inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1987. Joseph vai até o Japão quando descobre que seu neto Jotaro alega estar possuído por espíritos malignos e se recusa a sair da cela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O homem possuído por um espírito maligno

programme.title: Jotaro volta à vida normal, mas esconde o que Joseph chama de "Stand". A caminho da escola, o mesmo Jotaro se machuca e conhece um aluno chamado Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro ignora os protestos de Joseph e tenta usar seu Stand para impedir que DIO continue controlando o cérebro de Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin ataca um Stand sem saber quem é o seu usuário. Jotaro e seus aliados encontram um dos assassinos a mando de DIO no voo para o Egito.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vitória parece certa quando Avdol usa seus poderes contra o assassino Polnareff, que tem a mente controlada por DIO. Quem será o vencedor desta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados viajam até Singapura pelo mar. Um Stand com usuário desconhecido ataca Jotaro assim que um passageiro clandestino é encontrado no navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro encontra um orangotango em um cargueiro que parece abandonado. Durante uma busca no barco, eles se deparam com algo misterioso.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O grupo de Jotaro chega ao hotel em Singapura, mas Polnareff cai direto na armadilha de um usuário de Stand ao entrar no quarto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro começa a desconfiar que Kakyoin esteja possuído quando ele age de modo estranho e espanca brutalmente um ladrão em Singapura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff parte sozinho para vingar a irmã depois de ser atacado por um estranho Stand que só pode ser visto no reflexo de um espelho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 1

programme.title: Kakyoin tenta convencer Polnareff a fugir quando descobre que o aliado está enfrentando uma batalha perdida contra o Stand inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 2

programme.title: Algo estranho está crescendo no braço de Joseph. Quando um médico tenta retirá-lo, um rosto aparece no tumor e declara ser um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo ultrapassam um carro em uma estrada nas montanhas. Logo em seguida, Polnareff vê um caminhão no sentido contrário. Será que vai dar tempo de desviar?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados desconfiam que exista um Stand por perto quando encontram um cadáver em uma tranquila cidade do Paquistão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff é atacado por um exército de zumbis após descobrir que a velhinha responsável pelo hotel é uma usuária de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados enfrentam um assassino cruel, que segue as ordens de DIO para matar sem um pingo de hesitação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin e Polnareff descobrem um Stand inimigo capaz de atacar as células cerebrais quando mandam seus Stands para a cabeça de Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados atravessam um deserto em que o Sol nunca se põe e a temperatura aumenta a níveis insuportáveis.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin sonha com um parque de diversões onde se ouve o choro de um bebê. De volta ao mundo real, um bebê aparece como passageiro do avião em que está a equipe de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ninguém leva a preocupação de Kakyoin com o bebê a sério, mas a verdade logo vem à tona quando eles vão parar no mundo dos pesadelos.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o pai de Avdol em uma ilha remota, mas o homem vive sozinho e não quer contato com ninguém. Polnareff descobre uma lâmpada estranha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand que surge da lâmpada atende ao terceiro desejo de Polnareff e ressuscita Avdol, mas o ex-defunto só quer saber de acabar com o autor do desejo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo vão ao Egito em um submarino para enfrentar DIO, mas uma caneca de café passa por uma estranha transformação quando eles se aproximam do continente.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando precisam sair do submarino e escapar do Stand inimigo, Jotaro e seu grupo encontram o que parecem ser dois túneis embaixo d'água.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: Mee-Shee: O Gigante das Aguas, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: A viagem para Disney foi cancelada. Mac e seu pai, Sean, vão a uma cidade com um lago. Eles encontrarão aventuras emocionantes que superam a Disney, com perseguições e bandidos. Uma história de amizade para toda a família.

programme.title: Yoko, (2012, Children)
programme.desc: Uma menina em luto conhece Yoko, um ser cheio de bondade e gentileza.

programme.title: Victor e o Segredo da Mansão do Crocodilo, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Quando Victor, um menino de 11 anos, muda para a velha mansão do tio avô, descobre que lá desapareceu uma jovem chamada Cecilia. Victor não terá dúvidas em seguir as pistas para encontrar a verdade, mesmo que tenha que enfrentar grandes aventuras.

programme.title: Wu Kong - Contra a Ira dos Deuses, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: O jovem arqueólogo Jack Hunter planejou apenas tirar uma foto de uma tabuinha cuneiforme da outrora insuperável metrópole mesopotmiana Ugarit, na atual Síria, mas é pego e tem que roubá-la de um museu particular na França.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: O aventureiro Jack Hunter sai em busca de uma tumba lendária, encontrando perigosos velhos adversários e ainda mais perigosas velhas chamas ao longo do caminho.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Jack Hunter percebe que o túmulo do faraó estar vazio, exceto por uma moeda romana, significa que o tesouro foi saqueado para Roma, mas mais tarde provavelmente transferido para a nova capital bizantina, Constantinopla.

programme.title: Congo, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma expedição desaparece no Congo, um grupo é enviado para procura-la, em uma aventura cheia de acontecimentos, tecnologia e muito suspense.

programme.title: Jack Hunter, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: O jovem arqueólogo Jack Hunter planejou apenas tirar uma foto de uma tabuinha cuneiforme da outrora insuperável metrópole mesopotmiana Ugarit, na atual Síria, mas é pego e tem que roubá-la de um museu particular na França.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chinês, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japão que se torna um assassino para a máfia. O longa é focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japão.

programme.title: The Stooge, (1953, Comedy)
programme.desc: Money isn't everything and Bill Miller proves it. He's carved out a modest niche as a singer in the off-vaudeville circuit. But suddenly his act is big news.

programme.title: That's My Boy, (1951, Comedy)
programme.desc: An athletic father tries to press his hypochondriac teenage son to follow in his footsteps.

programme.title: The Caddy, (1953, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this zany farce, Harvey is a shy but talented pro golfer who, because he can't face the crowds, coaxes his buddy Joe into a big-time tournament. As Joe's caddy, Harvey is a disaster, and the two have a hilarious quarrel.

programme.title: Scared Stiff, (1953, Comedy)
programme.desc: Fleeing from a murder charge, Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis find gangsters and ghosts on a spooky Caribbean island inherited by an heiress.

programme.title: Artists and Models, (1955, Comedy)
programme.desc: A goonish young man receives telepathic top secret information in his nightmares, which are used by his artist friend in comic strips. Foreign agents and the CIA get interested.

programme.title: Hollywood Or Bust, (1956, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A movie-mad nitwit driving across the country to his mecca, Hollywood, is joined by a gambler who wants to break into singing when they pick up a pretty girl en route. Once in Hollywood the nitwit meets his dream goddess.

programme.title: Pardners, (1956, Comedy)
programme.desc: A rich momma's boy returns west with the son of his murdered father's partner to foil a gang trying to gain control of his family ranch. They accidentally clean up the town.

programme.title: The Delicate Delinquent, (1957, Comedy)
programme.desc: Lewis plays Sidney Pythias, a bumbling janitor caught up in the middle of a gang rumble. Mistaken for a member of the switchblade set, Sidney is encouraged to undergo a 180-degree transformation - from street hoodlum to full-fledged policeman!

programme.title: The Sad Sack, (1957, Comedy)
programme.desc: A bumbling hero with a photographic memory winds up in Morocco as a private in the French Foreign Legion. He still hasn't adjusted after 18 months. Among other things, he's lost a tank.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: The Next Three Days, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Brennan (Crowe) will stop at nothing to protect his family, but he’s never had to put his life and others’ on the line. When his wife is convicted of murder, and all appeals efforts are exhausted, the only hope he sees is breaking her out.

programme.title: Showdown at the Grand, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: A proud movie theater owner must defend his family business from corporate developers alongside a legendary action star as art imitates life in a showdown for the ages.

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: After his mission is exposed, a CIA operative (Gerard Butler) and his Afghan translator must fight their way out of hostile territory to an extraction point in Kandahar.

programme.title: Windtalkers, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: True story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WW II as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: For a decade, an elite team of intelligence and military operatives, working in secret across the globe, devoted themselves to a single goal: to find and eliminate Osama bin Laden. ZERO DARK THIRTY tells the story of history's greatest manhunt.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: For the first time you will SEE the activity... When a new family moves into a familiar house, they discover a mysterious video camera that reveals the presence of a demonic threat and soon find themselves terrorized by an ancient evil.

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: The activity is back and has claimed a new victim. Jesse has been hearing horrifying sounds from his neighbor’s apartment, but when he sets out to uncover their source, he encounters an ancient evil that won’t rest until it’s claimed his soul.

programme.title: Pet, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: A young waitress engages in psychological warfare with the lonely man who abducts her, revealing the darkness lurking in each of them.

programme.title: You're Next, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: The Davisons' family reunion goes awry when their home comes under siege by a mask-wearing team of crossbow-bearing assailants.

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: To Jill Johnson, it was the perfect babysitting job. The parents were away. The fridge was stocked. The children were tucked into bed. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.title: A Message from Brianna, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: A Message from Brianna

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Years after Devon disappeared, a mysterious website draws five adventurers to the abandoned asylum where she was last seen. Armed with cameras, they plunge into the darkness, unaware they’re filming their own descent into horror—never meant to return.

programme.title: You're Next, (2014, Horror)
programme.desc: The Davisons' family reunion goes awry when their home comes under siege by a mask-wearing team of crossbow-bearing assailants.

programme.title: The Evil Dead, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: Five friends are holed up in a remote cabin, where they discover a Book Of The Dead. They unwittingly summon demons living in the nearby woods, which possess the youngsters in succession until only one is left intact to fight for survival.

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bruno and team, now self-chosen traitors, learn from Trish during a moment of calm at a Venetian café a trip to Sardegna is vital. Chaos, then, erupts as Narancia loses his tongue and ability to speak the truth.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: As Giorno is teleported between puddles with Squalo’s shark attached firmly to his jugular, Narancia tries to sniff out the perpetrator using his CO2 tracer but is inhibited by Tiziano’s tongue-fusing Stand, frustrating himself and Bruno’s team.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bruno et al head to Marco Polo airport to venture to Sardegna to discover the truth behind Trish’s father. On the tarmac, however, is a swollen, neckless Stand user who, the team discovers while airborne, is linked to the freshly severed fingers onboard

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: At cruising altitude, Trish faces a voracious and fleshy mass of a Stand that strikes at the slightest movement. Meanwhile, Giorno’s incessantly pulsating broach, the key to the team’s survival, lies waiting—as does an unseen force within Trish.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Bruno and team make an emergency landing in Sardegna where the Hitman Team leader, Risotto, is also determined to uncover a certain mystery. Doppio, a timid, wide-eyed teen, the result of a seemingly impossible pregnancy, has his own goals on the island.
programme.sub-title: A Little Story From the Past ~My Name Is Doppio~

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Having discovered there is more to skittish Doppio than meets the eye, Risotto uses his Stand to manifest various metallic instruments of torture from within his enemy. Fortunately for Doppio, a way to foresee the inevitable offers a glimmer of hope.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: A picturesque Sardinian cliff becomes the bloody backdrop to Doppio’s sudden dominance over Risotto, courtesy of Narancia’s own Stand. On the beach below, Abbacchio works to rewind time 15 years to identify the identity of a certain photographer.
programme.sub-title: Under a Sky That Could Come Falling at Any Moment

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Witness destiny unfold for Trish and the rest of Bruno’s team as her father’s cryptic presence and arcane abilities pull the crew into battles of unspeakable brutality.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon decides to go to Kukuroo Mountain to bring Killua back.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Determined to see Killua, Gon and the others say that they are Killua's friends, and ask the guard to relay that message...

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: To be able to see Killua, Gon and friends choose to go through the Testing Gate.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Thanks to Canary's help, Gon and the others get closer to the mansion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends meet the butler Gotoh who proposes a game to see if they are worthy enough to be friends with Killua.
programme.sub-title: Can't See x If x You're Blind

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Aunt Mito receives another letter from Gon!

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Killua fights Zushi and senses his strange technique is similar to the one used by Illumi.
programme.sub-title: Arrival x At x The Arena

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Zushi's mentor, Wing, tells Gon and Killua about the existence of something known as Nen.

programme.title: Death Note: Glare
programme.desc: L insists on setting up bugs and cameras in the homes of Chief Yagami and Deputy Director Kitamura.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat's back on! And Eddie Murphy is cool as ever in this sizzling, smash-hit sequel to Beverly Hills Cop.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Eddie's back! So are the laughs. Eddie Murphy returns as Detroit cop Axel Foley, getting down with the fun-and-sun set as never before in this revved up thrill-ride of a movie.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop, (1984, Comedy)
programme.desc: The heat is on in this fast-paced action-comedy starring Eddie Murphy as Axel Foley, a street smart Detroit cop tracking down his best friend's killer in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Trading Places, (1983, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Senseless, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Perpetually-poor Darryl risks losing his dream Wall Street job to a wealthy snob until he finds a high-paying scientific experiment that gives him superhuman senses--and the competitive edge he needs. But when the side effects start, all bets are off!

programme.title: Yakuza Wolf 2, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Attacking Asao Uchida's lonely, clifftop mansion in no-holds barred massacre.

programme.title: The Bodyguard, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Karate master and anti-drug vigilante Kiba returns to his home in Japan, where he aims to wipe out the nation's drug industry.

programme.title: Karate Killer, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: Kiba is back again, but this time he has fallen from grace and sent to prison for all the violent acts he has committed. Once he's out, he begins working as a bodyguard in a club that is crawling with gangsters.

programme.title: Zatiochi: Darkness is His Ally, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: This thrilling martial arts epic finds nomadic hero Zatôichi in the middle of a bloody turf war between two rival clans. It is a blood-stained epic that shows the facilities of a man at odds with the Bushido Code.

programme.title: One-Percent Warrior, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: After his devastatingly fast, samurai-style combat approach sets filmmakers against him, a legendary action star (Tak Sakaguchi) films his own movie—on turf claimed by feuding yakuza gangs, including Japan’s deadliest martial arts assassin.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gang’s safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled), (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Ong Bak, (2003, Action)

programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: A college professor, who moonlights as a forensic psychiatrist for the FBI, receives a death threat that says he has only 88 minutes to live. To save his life, he must use all his skills and training to narrow down the possible suspects.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams, (1994, Documentary)
programme.desc: A film following the lives of two inner-city Chicago boys who struggle to become college basketball players on the road to going professional.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: The Substitute, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: An ex-marine goes undercover as a substitute teacher and discovers a gang is terrorizing the high school. As lives are threatened, he sets out to clean up the crime-infested school.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Cliffhanger, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: This gripping action-adventure tale features Sylvester Stallone as a member of the Rocky Mountain Rescue Team, still grieving over his inability to prevent a friend from falling to her death.

programme.title: Double Impact, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Double Team, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude Van Damme joins forces with NBA and media sensation Dennis Rodman in this action-packed thriller. Top counter-terrorist Jack Quinn is ready to get out of the spy game until the evil Stavros kidnaps his wife and unborn son.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Cliffhanger, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: This gripping action-adventure tale features Sylvester Stallone as a member of the Rocky Mountain Rescue Team, still grieving over his inability to prevent a friend from falling to her death.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Don't Look Now, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: On a trip to Venice, a young couple whose daughter has just died meet a psychic who leads them into a frightening and suspenseful experience. Based on a novel by Daphne Du Maurier.

programme.title: The Man Who Fell To Earth, (1976, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Thomas Jerome Newton (David Bowie) is a humanoid alien who comes to Earth to get water for his dying planet. He starts a high technology company to get the billions of dollars he needs to build a return spacecraft.

programme.title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down The Lane, (1976, Horror)
programme.desc: Jodie Foster and Martin Sheen star in this haunting story of a thirteen-year-old girl who lives in an old house with her reclusive father...all alone. Or does she? It seems she is hiding a dark secret, one she is determined to preserve. At any cost!

programme.title: Dark Star, (1974, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the far reaches of space, a small crew, 20 years into their solitary mission, find things beginning to go hilariously wrong.

programme.title: The Hospital, (1971, Comedy)
programme.desc: Paddy Chayefsky’s magnificently dark comedy, directed by Arthur Hiller, stars George C. Scott as the Head of Medicine at a hospital where, over one night, everything falls apart. Diana Rigg also stars as the free spirit who arrives just in time.

programme.title: Meatballs, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars as Tripper who guides a fun-seeking collection of lovable campers and libidinous staff members through the unique pleasures of a hysterical coed summer experience.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar®-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Monty Python Live at the Hollywood Bowl, (1982, Comedy)
programme.desc: The legendary live show from the Monty Python troupe. Performing many of their greatest sketches from Monty Python's Flying Circus and two Monty Python specials, Monty Python's Fliegender Zirkus, live from the Hollywood Bowl in 1980.

programme.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: Grossing the highest box-office of any British film in the US when released in 1975, this "cult classic" comedy from the Monty Python team loosely follows the legend of King Arthur, along with his squire and his Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy go head-to-head with Mother Nature, and Sanji’s rescue mission is bolstered by Franky’s allegiance – and the arrival of the mysterious Sniper King!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Smash the wave! Luffy and zoro use the strongest combo!

programme.title: Sniper King, a mysterious warrior from the island of snipers, lends a hand as Franky and Sanji try to fight their way to Robin.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious man appears?! His name is sniper king!

programme.title: Sanji mixes it up with a deranged cook, Franky dukes it out with the newest member of CP9, and the Sniper King gets creative in his attempt to reach Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown between cooks! Sanji vs. Ramen kenpo!

programme.title: Franky and Sanji continue to battle the thugs of CP9. Meanwhile, Luffy and the rest of the gang find themselves headed for a collision that could spell doom for everyone!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro faces a fellow master of the blade, Sanji looks to end his fight against a rampaging ramen master, and Franky finally lands a big blow against his CP9 foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash! Demon-slasher zoro vs. Ship-slasher t-bone!

programme.title: The Sniper King hatches a daring escape plan, but the assassins of CP9 are more powerful than our heroes ever imagined. Meanwhile, Luffy and the gang run into a very familiar frog!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Scramble over robin! A cunning plan by sniper king!

programme.title: As their train approaches Enies Lobby, Franky’s kind words cut through Robin’s cold exterior. Luffy’s train is thrown off course, but the group gains a powerful new ally!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The judicial island! Full view of enies lobby!

programme.title: The Straw Hats hatch a plan to rescue Robin, but as usual, Luffy can’t wait to find a fight. Will his impulsive attack derail their mission?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Landing operations start! Charge in, straw hats!

programme.title: Luffy manages to reach the main island, but the Franky Family’s assault is stopped short by a couple of angry giants!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy cuts through! Big showdown on the judicial island!

programme.title: Luffy makes short work of a few hundred marines, the Franky Family takes down a giant, and the assassins of CP9 report back to Spandam!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Battle against giants! Open the second gate!

programme.title: Zoro’s quick thinking – and a little help from a giant frog – sends the sea train soaring into the sky on a collision course with armed guards and their canine companions!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Find a way out! Rocketman takes flight!

programme.title: Nami electrocutes the enemy with a Clima Tact attack, but the bad guys have the Straw Hats surrounded until the Franky Family shows up with a couple of sea monsters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Catch up with luffy! The straw hats' all-out battle

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, Nami, and Chopper try to catch up with their captain, Soge King is nowhere to be found, and Luffy runs head first into a battle with Blueno!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin betrayed! The motive of the world government!

programme.title: Luffy shows off his new strength in a brawl with Blueno, Soge King befriends a giant, and a hulking sea beast makes the ultimate sacrifice.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Give robin back! Luffy vs. Blueno!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his battle with Blueno, Soge King’s giant companions make their presence felt, and the assassins of CP9 experiment with Devil Fruits!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Don't stop! Hoist the counterattack signal!

programme.title: A blind Kingbull fights with his last breath to get the Straw Hats one step closer to their captain. Luffy kick his body into second gear to protect his friends from dangerous foes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Almost to luffy! Gather at the courthouse plaza!

programme.title: Luffy batters a baffled Blueno with his powerful new fighting style, and the cowardly Spandam begins to panic at the sound of the Straw Hats approaching!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everything is to protect my friends! Second gear activated!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited and ready to rescue Robin, but the raven-haired beauty remains reluctant to rejoin her former mates despite Franky’s urging.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Give us your answer, robin! The straw hats' outcry!

programme.title: Flash back to Robin’s days as a young girl, her dangerous pursuit of forbidden knowledge, and her encounter with a friendly giant.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin's past! The girl who was called a devil!

programme.title: Robin’s flashback continues with the heartbreaking arrival of her mother – and the government’s cruel and brutal invasion of a peaceful island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fated mother and daughter! The mother's name is olvia!

programme.title: Professor Clover reveals a startling and sinister theory about the World Government, Robin reunites with her mother, and a giant joins the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The tragedy of ohara! The terror of the buster call!

programme.title: The painful story of Ohara – and Robin’s younger years – draws to a tragic close. Luffy declares war on the World Government, and Robin finally changes her tune!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Say you want to live! We are your friends!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are ready to begin the fight for Robin, but first, Luffy flashes back to memories of his childhood – and the man who made him want to become a pirate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Jump towards the falls! Luffy's feelings!

programme.title: Zoro remembers the first time he met Luffy, and Usopp recalls the events that led him to join the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ways of men! Zoro's techniques, usopp's dream!

programme.title: Nami’s heartbreaking past – and Luffy’s epic battle with Arlong – are recalled in this flashback to the early days of the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A bond of friendship woven by tears! Nami's world map!

programme.title: A flashback sheds light on how Sanji came to join the crew, and Chopper’s backstory is revealed through memories of a visit to a snow-covered island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Parting builds a man's character! Sanji and chopper!

programme.title: A flashback reveals Robin’s motives for cooperating with CP9, Nami’s shocking discovery about the archaeologist’s past, and Luffy’s determination to save his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everything is for her friends! Robin in the darkness!

programme.title: Franky stands up to Spandam by destroying what the madman desires most, and the sound of the sea train spurs the Straw Hats to make a daring leap of faith!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'm not gonna hand over the blueprints! Franky's decision!

programme.title: Luffy races to rescue Robin while the rest of the Straw Hats set off in search of the five keys needed to unlock the archaeologist!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Obtain the five keys! The straw hat pirates vs. Cp9!

programme.title: While Usopp and Zoro go head-to-head with a couple of animal assassins, Sanji teaches the most beautiful member of CP9 the secrets of making good tea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Devil fruit powers! Kaku and jabra transform!

programme.title: Luffy runs into trouble trying to sail his way to Robin, Usopp and Zoro end up handcuffed together, and Sanji’s inability to kick a women may lead to serious injury!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I won't kick even if it costs me my life! Sanji's chivalry!

programme.title: Chimney and Gombe show Luffy the secret passage that leads to Robin, and Franky puts on a display of raw punching power thanks to a few bottles of cola!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fukurou's miscalculation! My cola is the water of life!

programme.title: While Franky’s brawl spills into the ocean, Usopp and Sanji attempt to overcome their handcuffs by outsmarting their opponents!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro busts out a new technique! The sword's name is sniper king?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose…

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
